content.description: This route ascends a dirty, flaring, seam/crack/chimney thing through both good and not so good rock.
content.protection: Nuts, double cams to #1 camalot, single cams to #3 or #4, some slings.  rap from hangerless bolt & fixed Tricam.
content.location: The furthest right route on the Beehive.  Located way right around the corner in the shade.  Look for the anchor.

content.description:
A good route that could benefit from a few more ascents. 

  Climb up and out of the cave on good rock to the obvious crack above.  A couple face moves past a bolt lead to more crack climbing to a bolted anchor.
content.protection: Nuts, double cams to #3 camalot, with a few extra fingers-thin hand pieces.  Bolted anchor at the top.
content.location: The obvious deep black cave in the middle of The Beehive.

content.description: A nice crag with a shorter than usual approach.  Some of the routes are still a touch dirty and could benefit from a few more ascents.
